com.github.git24j.core

Class Merge

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.git24j.core.Merge

  • public class Merge
extends Object
    Git merge util functions, all are static

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Merge.AnalysisPair
      POJO contains analysis result from Merge::analysis and Merge::analysisForRef
      static class  Merge.AnalysisT
      The results of `git_merge_analysis` indicate the merge opportunities.
      static class  Merge.FileFavorT
      Merge file favor options for `git_merge_options` instruct the file-level merging functionality how to deal with conflicting regions of the files.
      static class  Merge.FileFlagT
      File merging flags
      static class  Merge.FileInput
      The file inputs to `git_merge_file`.
      static class  Merge.FileOptions
      options for merging a file
      static class  Merge.FileResult 
      static class  Merge.FlagT
      Flags for `git_merge` options.
      static class  Merge.Options
      Merging options
      static class  Merge.PreferenceT
      The user's stated preference for merges.

      • base

        @Nonnull
public static Optional<Oid> base(@Nonnull
                                          Repository repo,
                                          @Nonnull
                                          Oid one,
                                          @Nonnull
                                          Oid two)
        Find a merge base between two commits
        Parameters:
        repo - the repository where the commits exist
        one - one of the commits
        two - the other commit
        Returns:
        the OID of a merge base between 'one' and 'two'
        Throws:
        GitException - git errors 0 on success, GIT_ENOTFOUND if not found or error code

      • bases

        @Nonnull
public static List<Oid> bases(@Nonnull
                                       Repository repo,
                                       @Nonnull
                                       Oid one,
                                       @Nonnull
                                       Oid two)
        Find merge bases between two commits
        Parameters:
        repo - the repository where the commits exist
        one - one of the commits
        two - the other commit
        Returns:
        list of merge base ids, empty if not found
        Throws:
        GitException - 0 on success

      • trees

        @Nonnull
public static Index trees(@Nonnull
                                   Repository repo,
                                   @Nullable
                                   Tree ancestorTree,
                                   @Nullable
                                   Tree ourTree,
                                   @Nullable
                                   Tree theirTree,
                                   @Nullable
                                   Merge.Options opts)
        Merge two trees, producing a `git_index` that reflects the result of the merge. The index may be written as-is to the working directory or checked out. If the index is to be converted to a tree, the caller should resolve any conflicts that arose as part of the merge.

        The returned index must be freed explicitly with `git_index_free`.

        Parameters:
        repo - repository that contains the given trees
        ancestorTree - the common ancestor between the trees (or null if none)
        ourTree - the tree that reflects the destination tree
        theirTree - the tree to merge in to `our_tree`
        opts - the merge tree options (or null for defaults)
        Returns:
        index of the merge
        Throws:
        GitException - git errors

      • commits

        @Nonnull
public static Index commits(@Nonnull
                                     Repository repo,
                                     @Nullable
                                     Commit ourCommit,
                                     @Nullable
                                     Commit theirCommit,
                                     @Nullable
                                     Merge.Options opts)
        Merge two commits, producing a `git_index` that reflects the result of the merge. The index may be written as-is to the working directory or checked out. If the index is to be converted to a tree, the caller should resolve any conflicts that arose as part of the merge.

        The returned index must be freed explicitly with `git_index_free`.

        Parameters:
        repo - repository that contains the given trees
        ourCommit - the commit that reflects the destination tree
        theirCommit - the commit to merge in to `our_commit`
        opts - the merge tree options (or null for defaults)
        Returns:
        index reflecting the merge result
        Throws:
        GitException - git errors

        Analyzes the given branch(es) and determines the opportunities for merging them into the HEAD of the repository.
        Parameters:

        theirHeads - the heads to merge into
        Returns:
        out analysis
        Throws:

                                                 Oid[] inputArray)

      • file

        @Nonnull
public static Merge.FileResult file(@Nonnull
                                             Merge.FileInput ancestor,
                                             @Nonnull
                                             Merge.FileInput ours,
                                             @Nonnull
                                             Merge.FileInput theirs,
                                             @Nullable
                                             Merge.FileOptions opts)
        Merge two files as they exist in the in-memory data structures, using the given common ancestor as the baseline, producing a `git_merge_file_result` that reflects the merge result. The `git_merge_file_result` must be freed with `git_merge_file_result_free`.

        Note that this function does not reference a repository and any configuration must be passed as `git_merge_file_options`.

        Parameters:
        ancestor - The contents of the ancestor file
        ours - The contents of the file in "our" side
        theirs - The contents of the file in "their" side
        opts - The merge file options or `NULL` for defaults
        Returns:
        The merge result
        Throws:
        GitException - git errors

      • merge

        public static void merge(@Nonnull
                         Repository repo,
                         @Nonnull
                         List<AnnotatedCommit> theirHeads,
                         @Nullable
                         Merge.Options mergeOpts,
                         @Nullable
                         Checkout.Options checkoutOpts)
        Merges the given commit(s) into HEAD, writing the results into the working directory. Any changes are staged for commit and any conflicts are written to the index. Callers should inspect the repository's index after this completes, resolve any conflicts and prepare a commit.

        For compatibility with git, the repository is put into a merging state. Once the commit is done (or if the uses wishes to abort), you should clear this state by calling `git_repository_state_cleanup()`.

        Parameters:
        repo - the repository to merge
        theirHeads - the heads to merge into
        mergeOpts - merge options
        checkoutOpts - checkout options
        Throws:
        GitException - git errors
